name: Canadian Conversion Pack
black_cards: In an attempt to reach a wider audience, the Royal Ontario Museum has opened an interactive exhibit on ___.
What's the Canadian government using to inspire rural students to suceed?
in the next Bob and Doug McKenzie adventure, they have to find ___ to uncover a sinister plot involving ___ and ___.

In Vancouver it is now legal to ___.
O Canada, we stand on guard for ___.
If ___ came in two-fours, Canada would be more ___.
After unifying the GST and PST, the Government can now afford to provide ___ for ___.
white_cards: Syrupy sex with a maple tree
